description:
Non-Material Amendment to planning permission ref:P2017/5015/FUL, dated; 26/06/2018 to allow for the following alterations:
(a) To the south elevation at ground floor including changes to single new fixed glazing element to the south east corner and enlargement of approved openings including new double door and fanlight
(b) To the north elevation including changes to windows, and enlargement and additional door for new refuse storage area at ground floor
(c) To the east elevation including to the shopfront
(d) Position of louvres to first, second, third and fourth floors to north elevation
(e) Painting of external elevations
(f) Internal configuration to allow for the enlargement of approved ground floor entrance to office accommodation
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposed changes to the windows and doors to the north, south and east elevations at ground floor are not considered to be non-material amendments to the approved development P2017/5015/FUL as they would have a material impact upon the character of the development, the street scene and the surrounding area and as such would require the submission of an application for planning permission or a S73 application.
